instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Malay language.
input: Some areas could see an additional 6 inches of snow by Saturday morning.
output: Beberapa kawasan akan melihat tambahan salji setinggi 6 inci pada pagi Sabtu.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Malay language.
input: According to reports, multiple Israeli airstrikes in the Gaza Strip have injured three children, including one infant.
output: Menurut satu laporan, beberapa serangan udara Israel ke Semenanjung Gaza telah mencederakan tiga kanak-kanak, termasuk seorang bayi.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Malay language.
input: Dr. Evangelos Michelakis of the University of Alberta in Edmonton, Canada found that that DCA causes tumor regressions in animals with human cancers.
output: Doktor Evangelos Michelakis dari Universiti Alberta di Edmonton, Kanada mendapati bahawa DCA menyebabkan regresi tumor pada haiwan dengan kanser manusia.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Malay language.
input: Medha Patkar, Narmada Bachao Andolan activist in the ninth day of a hunger strike protesting the Sardar Sarovar Project, is forcibly moved to hospital in New Delhi by police.
output: Medha Patkar, aktivis Narmada Bachao Andolan pada hari yang kesembilan mogok lapar membantah Projek Sardar Sarovar, secara paksa dipindahkan ke hospital di New Delhi oleh polis.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Malay language.
input: Santorum tried to alleviate the neologism's results in web searches by reaching out to Google in September, but this act only served to increase reporting and coverage of the phenomenon.
output: Santorum cuba untuk mengurangkan hasil neologisma dalam carian web dengan menghubungi Google pada bulan September, tetapi tindakan ini hanya meningkatkan laporan dan liputan fenomena tersebut.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Malay language.
input: I'll Have Another, who won both the 2012 Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes, was removed from the field in this weekend's Belmont Stakes — effectively ending the thoroughbred's attempt to become the twelfth US Triple Crown winner in history.
output: I'll Have Another, yang pernah memenangi kedua-dua Kentucky Derby dan Preakness Stakes tahun 2012, telah dikeluarkan dari lapangan pada Belmont Stakes hujung minggu ini - sekaligus menamatkan percubaan belima tersebut untuk menjadi pemenang kedua belas US Triple Crown dalam sejarah.
